about.title: About me
about.primary: I'm an aspiring software engineer who loves problem-solving, coding, and developing systems that scale. I love tinkering with applications and code bases, figuring out how they work, and fixing them. I am an interest-driven, tech agnostic person with a strong work ethic and programming ability. Currently, I am learning about microservice architecture and building scalable systems.
about.secondary: I love solving business / real life problems with unique algorithms and communicating complex ideas to business stakeholders. Whenever I find time, I also love to contribute to open-source, either on an existing project or by building my projects.

projects.title: E-commerce [Microservices]
projects.description: An e-commerce backend built using microservice architecture, with an immediately consistent ordering system.

projects.title: cxd
projects.description: A chest x-ray diagnosis application build on top a research we conducted by training several deep CNNs to diagnose chest radiographs.

projects.title: synthetic-metric
projects.description: A python package to compute quality and privacy of synthetic data.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: This is where you can describe about your contact. The more you describe about your contact, the more chances you have!
